channel.title: RuneScape - Old school
channel.description:
[img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/9989/oldschoolrs.png[/img] Okay, let's get down to it,
my idea: To make a server replica to old RS2 will be using realistic XP rates maybe 8xp or 12xp per hit still thinking, but will make it a pickup server so basically most of the players will be low level pking, I think thats a good idea but I don't know can you guys tell me what you think, I just want to bring RS2 back.
Base: Delta Cleaned V1.5 by Avoid, yes it's Delta..
So.. Tell me what you think of my idea.
Media: [img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/2355/1stscreen.png[/img] [img]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/4251/screen2qq.png[/img] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/1527/screen2vu.png[/img]
Project started; 9/07/2010 9/07/2010 - changed experience rate 9/07/2010 - started teleports 10/07/2010 - started working on weapon animations 10/07/2010 - started working on 2h's 10/07/2010 - skill advances

item.title: RuneScape - Old school
item.dc:creator: @Bromann Bromann
item.description:
@Bromann wrote:

Good luck OP, stick with it, I’m sure a lot of people would like to see this.

pyroshell:

This is a total copy of my idea. Thanks for stealing

I think a lot of people have this idea.

You’re not some magical genius that thinks up great things no one else thinks of.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Old school
item.dc:creator: @Djayboi6 Dj_
item.description:
@Djayboi6 wrote:

[quote=“D.Ducky911, post:2, topic:348266”]These are just geting pathetic… Let it go. Nothing will ever top Project Annihilation; thus, why do people continue to try?

I guess good luck; just don’t expect to get as much support, since plenty of good, superior bases have been released.[/quote]
just because there already a project that may be tops doesnt mean people dont want to learn how he did it so possibly in the future they could make something just as good. people will never learn if they dont try and ur critisim isnt heping…

Read full topic
